title: Grand Canyon National Park: Education
body: Grand Canyon as a Classroom From scenic hikes to live Internet programs, Grand Canyon provides learning adventures for students and teachers throughout the the world. Come explore!  Parks as Classrooms: Field trips, lesson plans, and in-school outreach programs  Professional Development: Opportunities for teachers  Distance Learning: Internet-based educational programs  Additional Resources: Photos, videos, websites, and more  Follow us: Twitter updates @GrandCanyonEdu                  Summer Expeditions for Teens Calling middle and high school students! Apply for a fantastic summer 2016 adventure in Grand Canyon National Park. Read More        Be a Junior Ranger Kids - become a Grand Canyon Junior Ranger during your next visit and learn how to protect the park. Read More
